name: The Bomb of Truth (TheDestoryer)
description: A 2D platformer with many fake obstacles you can throw a bomb on to see if they are real. This game uses a modified version of the microfantasy tileset(https://0x72.itch.io/microfantasy) and 16x16 dungeon tileset (https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset). I did not make any of the art as I'm bad at drawing.
